name: Who's Face Is It Anyway?
description:
Add content to your videos and photos in realtime though advanced face tracking! Place funny glasses on you toys, friends, turn your kids heads into cavemen, open a dino's mouth, and more!

The absolute latest tech in facial feature recognition for tracking and placement of content on media at interactive rates provides a rich, intuitive experience! High end 3D rendering provides avatar overlays and 3d mouth animation. 2D texture compositing allows more diversity of media that can be combined in the final image.
